oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-10-15 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 15, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Don Gibson (host/performer), guest performer Billy Walker, and regular performers the Jordanaires (recently back from Hollywood, CA.), Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1097th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Don Gibson; Jordanaires; Billy Walker; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Don Gibson -- Far, Far Away (Don Gibson, Jordanaires) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Don Gibson) -- Don Gibson introduces the Jordanaires -- Working On A Building (Jordanaires) -- Grant Turner and Don Gibson introduce Billy Walker -- Gotta Find A Way (Billy Walker) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Don Gibson) -- Grant Turner introduces Tommy Jackson -- Old Joe Clark (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Grant Turner and Don Gibson talk -- Where No One Stands Alone (Don Gibson, Jordanaires) -- Don Gibson introduces Chet Atkins -- Black Mountain Rag (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jordanaires (Musical group); Gibson, Don (Donald Eugene), 1928-2003; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006
